name: ai-traveller-buddy-backend
description: Backend API server for AI Traveller Buddy application

scripts.start-bg: nohup nodemon index.js > server.log 2>&1 & echo 'Server started in background. Check status with: npm run status'
scripts.stop: pkill -f 'nodemon.*index.js' || pkill -f 'node.*index.js' || lsof -ti:3001 | xargs kill -9 || echo 'No server process found'
scripts.force-stop: sudo lsof -ti:3001 | xargs sudo kill -9 && echo 'Forcefully stopped all processes on port 3001'
scripts.status: echo 'Checking server status...' && lsof -i:3001 || echo 'No process running on port 3001'
scripts.restart: npm run stop && sleep 2 && npm start

author: Maxed31
